summary: This mod changes the level lists so soul gems empty and full of all levels are always in stock on vendors.  It also includes a optional plugin for the NPC Enthir to sell black soul gems in larger quantities.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	     LFox Vendors Have Soul Gems v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the soul gem
leveled lists for Spell and General Vendors.

LFox Vendors Have Black Soul Gems.esp will be incompatible with
anything that modifies Enthirs vendor chest.  This is a dirty
way to edit shop inventories and should NOT be encouraged.  It
will be replaced with scripting when the Creation Kit is released.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Normally soul gems are found in small handfuls on vendors.  A
few here a few there.  That\'s fine but its annoying when your
trying to use enchanting on your gear or to level it up.  This
mod changes the level lists so soul gems empty and full of all
levels are always in stock on vendors.

There is also an optional plugin that can be enabled.  That
changes the vendor chest for the NPC called Enthir who lives
in Winterhold Mages College to stock 10 black soul gems that
respawn instead of just 1.

LFox Vendors Have Soul Gems.esp
Soul Gems will be stocked in the following amounts:
Spell Vendors 20, General Vendors 5

LFox Vendors Have Black Soul Gems.esp
Makes Enthir in Winterhold Mages College sell 10 black soul gems.

NOTE: The spell vendor chests contain 20 copies of the level
lists.  General vendors contain 5 copies.  Due to random being
so utterly random that you either get nothing or all the lower
soul gem versions were scrapped since they did not work as
intended.  Do not ask for a version with less soul gems.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

- Made the plugin
